description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Driving : Try out your driving skills in 5 game modes, Play through all 50 levels in 4 different environments. With the choice of 4 different vehicles.
